tool.name: SAGA.shapes_tools.18
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArraySHAPES False isArrayDIST_FIELD False output_data_BUFFER $output_data_BUFFER name SAGA.shapes_tools.18 SHAPES $SHAPES DIST_FIELD $DIST_FIELD DIST_FIELD_DEFAULT $DIST_FIELD_DEFAULT DIST_SCALE $DIST_SCALE DISSOLVE $DISSOLVE NZONES $NZONES POLY_INNER $POLY_INNER DARC $DARC prefer $prefer response $response outputType_BUFFER $OutputSection_BUFFER.outputType_BUFFER transmissionMode_BUFFER $OutputSection_BUFFER.transmissionMode_BUFFER

param.name: SHAPES
param.label: Shapes
param.help: Shapes The following data types are allowed in the txt file: vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, json, xml

param.name: DIST_FIELD
param.label: Buffer Distance
param.help: Buffer Distance The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: DIST_FIELD_DEFAULT
param.label: Default
param.help: default value if no attribute has been selected

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_BUFFER
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_BUFFER
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: A vector based buffer construction partly based on the method supposed by Dong et al. (2003).
